ch0039_00_viola/0101_0701_01_10:
Here again today, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
That’s fantastic! Just fantastic!
ch0039_00_viola/0101_0701_02_10:
Let’s make today a great day and fill up a whole
photo album!
ch0039_00_viola/0601_0701_01_10: My older sister, Alexa, gave me my camera.
ch0039_00_viola/0601_0701_02_10: Alexa’s a journalist for a big publishing house!
ch0039_00_viola/0601_0701_03_10:
My dream is to use this camera to take all kinds
of pictures of different Pokémon!
ch0039_00_viola/0601_0701_04_10: Of course I’m taking pictures on Pasio, too.
ch0039_00_viola/0601_0701_05_10: I feel like Pasio’s got a lot of passion!
ch0039_00_viola/0601_0702_01_10:
By the way, I’m a Gym Leader. At the
Santalune City Gym, you can see my
Pokémon pictures on display.
ch0039_00_viola/0601_0702_02_10:
I’m trying to get the word out about it here on
Pasio, too. I hope people will come to see it.
ch0039_00_viola/0601_0702_03_10: It’s really charming, so it’s pretty popular!
ch0039_00_viola/0602_0701_01_10:
Surskit is a Pokémon that walks on top of the
water with Swift Swim!
ch0039_00_viola/0602_0701_02_10:
I don’t even know how many times I’ve captured
her grace with my camera!
ch0039_00_viola/0602_0701_03_10:
Her charms are unending, no matter how many
pictures I take. I just love it!
ch0039_00_viola/0602_0702_01_10:
If you ever meet a wild Surskit, be sure to watch
it closely!
ch0039_00_viola/0602_0702_02_10:
Its tiny legs support its whole body on the
water. How can you not love it?
ch0039_00_viola/0603_0701_01_10:
I take pictures of things other than
Pokémon, too!
ch0039_00_viola/0603_0701_02_10:
Pokémon Trainers, of course. But also the scenery
in towns and natural settings!
ch0039_00_viola/0603_0701_03_10:
When I’m shooting Pokémon, of course Bug-type
Pokémon are my favorites! They’re just so cute!
ch0039_00_viola/0603_0701_04_10:
The Evolution of Bug-type Pokémon is a lot
faster and more mysterious than other Pokémon!
ch0039_00_viola/0603_0702_01_10:
I’ll never get tired of taking pictures of
Pokémon, no matter how many I take.
ch0039_00_viola/0603_0702_02_10:
Focusing on something I love and clicking
the shutter is the best feeling in the world!
ch0039_00_viola/0604_0701_01_10:
There’s a Pokémon from the Kalos region called
Vivillon. It’s a fantastic Pokémon!
ch0039_00_viola/0604_0701_02_10:
Even though they’re the same species, many
Vivillon have different wing patterns!
ch0039_00_viola/0604_0701_03_10:
That’s why there are lots of people around the
world who collect different Vivillon!
ch0039_00_viola/0604_0701_04_10:
I’m one of those people! Even here on Pasio, 
I plan to look for people with rare Vivillon!
ch0039_00_viola/0604_0702_01_10:
I want to make an album with photos of every
kind of Vivillon someday!
ch0039_00_viola/0604_0702_02_10:
You’ll help me with that, right? I’m really
looking forward to it!
ch0039_00_viola/0605_0701_01_10: I think it’s really great that I came to Pasio!
ch0039_00_viola/0605_0701_02_10:
I’ve met a lot of Pokémon, and I met you, too,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0039_00_viola/0605_0701_03_10: To me, you’re a fantastic photo subject!
ch0039_00_viola/0605_0702_01_10:
But not just as a model, of course. I really enjoy
Pokémon battles together with you, too!
ch0039_00_viola/0605_0702_02_10:
Let’s keep on doing our best,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0039_00_viola/1701_0701_01_10:
I found this while I was wandering around town
with my camera!
ch0039_00_viola/1701_0701_02_10: Here’s a present to celebrate your strength!
ch0039_00_viola/1701_0702_01_10:
There are things you can only see 
through a viewfinder!
ch0039_00_viola/1701_0702_02_10:
If I find anything again, I’ll be sure to give
it to you!
ch0039_00_viola/2501_0701_01_10:
Oh! Look at that Pokémon’s nimble walk! 
What a photo op!
ch0039_00_viola/2501_0701_02_10:
Wha—?! It ran off.
I must’ve gotten too close.
ch0039_00_viola/2501_0701_03_10:
The trick to taking Pokémon pictures is to not
alert them to your presence.
ch0039_00_viola/2501_0701_04_10:
Making sure you don’t startle or alert the
Pokémon—that’s gotta be the first step, right?
ch0039_00_viola/2501_0702_01_10:
Take your lens and focus it...focus it...
Then snap that shot!
ch0039_00_viola/2501_0702_02_10:
Practice helps you get better at taking pictures. 
It’s the same for catching Pokémon, right?
ch0039_00_viola/2501_0702_03_10:
You need to aim your throw with the Poké Ball.
Then throw it at the exact right time!
ch0039_00_viola/2501_0702_04_10:
Timing is important to both. Poké Balls and film
are limited, after all.
ch0039_00_viola/2511_0701_01_10:
Ah, wait! I should take a picture here! 
You’ve got a great smile going on!
ch0039_00_viola/2511_0701_02_10:
Hm? Why am I so into taking photos? Hmm.
I guess it’s because of my older sister.
ch0039_00_viola/2511_0701_03_10:
Alexa, writer for the Lumiose Press! That’s
my supercool older sister.
ch0039_00_viola/2511_0701_04_10:
My older sister knows I love pictures, so
she gave me this wonderful camera!
ch0039_00_viola/2511_0702_01_10:
Why do I take pictures of smiling faces?
That should be obvious!
ch0039_00_viola/2511_0702_02_10:
Because they’re just fabulous! That’s how I feel
about smiling faces!
ch0039_00_viola/2511_0702_03_10:
Taking pictures and having pictures taken
makes people happier and happier. It’s the best!
ch0039_00_viola/2511_0702_04_10:
Taking joyful pictures is the whole reason I’m
a photographer!
ch0039_00_viola/3001_0701_01_10:
Good morning!
Let’s make sure today’s fantastic!
ch0039_00_viola/3002_0701_01_10: I bet I’ll find a lot of photo ops today, too!
ch0039_00_viola/3003_0701_01_10:
Good afternoon!
No matter what time of day it is,
I always feel fantastic!
ch0039_00_viola/3004_0701_01_10:
During the day, everything gets so active!
Even Pokémon!
ch0039_00_viola/3005_0701_01_10:
Good evening!
Nighttime photography can be tricky,
but you can snag some fantastic photos.
ch0039_00_viola/3006_0701_01_10:
You worked hard today! Get some good rest so
we can take another shot tomorrow!
